item.title: MIUI V11.0.8.0.PFHCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 7 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 7 Pro China

Codename: violet

Version: V11.0.8.0.PFHCNXM | 9.0

Size: 2.9 GB

MD5: 899b0d2046957c4975a4efbb772bcb5d

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2020. Increased system security.
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Couldn't open notification settings in the Notification shade in Second space
Fix: Couldn't open the Notification shade in some cases
[Data usage]
Fix: Items related to exceptions weren't always displayed accurately
Fix: Searching for apps made the device slow down
Fix: Data usage warning appeared multiple times
Fix: Errors occurred after switching SIM cards
[Xiaomi Cloud]
Fix: An error message saying that IMEI couldn't be identified appeared multiple times
[Other]
Fix: Images overlapped in scrolling screenshots

Download: Here
